Package com.nookure.staff.api.service

Interface UserNoteService

public interface UserNoteService
This service is used to manage the user notes.

  • Method Details

    • addNote

      void addNote(@NotNull @NotNull CommandSender staff, @NotNull @NotNull String targetUsername, @NotNull @NotNull String note, boolean showOnJoin, boolean showOnlyToAdministrators)
      Adds a note to a user.

      The note will be shown when a staff member joins the server if showOnJoin is true. The note will only be shown to administrators if showOnlyToAdministrators is true.
      The note will be saved in the database.
      If the target user does not exist in the player database, the note will not be saved, send a message to the staff member who executed the command.
      The note will be propagated to all the servers in the network via the messaging service.

      Parameters:
      staff - the staff member who is adding the note
      targetUsername - the username of the user who will receive the note
      note - the note to add
      showOnJoin - whether the note should be shown when a staff member joins the server
      showOnlyToAdministrators - whether the note should only be shown to administrators

    • removeNote

      void removeNote(@NotNull @NotNull CommandSender staff, @NotNull @NotNull Long id)
      Remove a note.
      Parameters:
      staff - the staff member who is removing the note
      id - the id of the note to remove

    • displayNotes

      void displayNotes(@NotNull @NotNull CommandSender staff, @NotNull @NotNull String targetUsername, int page)
      Display the notes of a user.
      Parameters:
      staff - the staff member who is requesting the notes
      targetUsername - the username of the user whose notes will be displayed
      page - the page of the notes to display

    • displayNotes

      Display a note to a staff member.
      Parameters:
      staff - the staff member who is requesting the note
      player - the player who has the note
      note - the note to display
